text: Every society in the history of man has upheld the institution of marriage as a bond between a man and a woman. Why? Because society is based on one thing: that society is based on the future of the society. And that's what? Children. Monogamous relationships.
author: Rick Santorum

text: The Obama administration now has regulations that tells them that they can no longer promote marriage to these young girls. author: Rick Santorum

text: You know for many elected officials they all started in the same place. You know marriage is between a man and a woman, but they understand that they are moving inevitably, catching up to the American public.
author: James McGreevey
